## useScope() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useScope(enforcedScope?: string): string
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type                | Description                                                 |
| ------------- | ------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| enforcedScope | <code>string</code> | If provided, used as the scope instead of the current scope |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`
